description: Action items and decisions related to relationships

todos.action: Text Kiara to apologize and set up a call
todos.context: I left quickly last night after she said goodbye, and I want to explain why. After working through my thoughts, I formulated a message that was honest about avoidance and asked for her perspective.
todos.messageSent: Hey - sorry I rushed off. I've been avoiding working through some relationship stuff and could use your perspective - rushing off was kind of a symptom of that. Would love to catch up in person, but would a call work if you have time?
todos.achievement: Successfully formulated an honest, vulnerable message that acknowledges avoidance behavior, asks for help without demanding it, and opens the door for a meaningful conversation.
